subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Becky Hammon was 5 for 10 on 3-pointers and finished with 23 points to lead the visiting Liberty to a 71-67 victory last night against her former teammate Vickie Johnson and the San Antonio Silver Stars.
snippet: Becky Hammon was 5 for 10 on 3-pointers and finished with 23 points to lead the visiting Liberty to a 71-67 victory last night against her former teammate Vickie Johnson and the San Antonio Silver Stars.
